channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report X-2023080762
item.description:
Report X-2023080762

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-06T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-04
  • City: GRIMES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was brough to QA wet. An employee started filing a DPR and repacking the contents for delivery, then felt her hands burning and other areas of her body where she touched herself. DescribePack: The original package was discarded before the employee knew she was working with a hazmat material. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: We applied gloves and cleaned up where contents were wet on public surfaces.
